search.query: `cs_linux_users_with_previledge` | table _time host UID USERNAME GID HOME_DIR | stats earliest(_time) as _time latest(*) as * by host UID | append [| search `cs_linux_sudousers` | stats latest(_raw) as raw by host | rex field=raw "sudouser=(?<USERNAME>.*)" max_match=0 | fields - raw | mvexpand USERNAME | eval sudo_access="Yes"] | stats first(*) as * by host, USERNAME | fillnull sudo_access value="-"

html.p: This dashboard includes all linux/unix security related reports.
Data Collection: It uses two Add-ons to collect different data. Linux Auditd Technology Add-On and Splunk Add-on for Linux and Unix (*nix)

search.query: `cs_linux_users_with_previledge` | head 1 | stats count | eval label="`cs_linux` sourcetype=\"usersWithLoginPrivs\"" | append [| search `cs_linux_sudousers` | head 1 | stats count | eval label="`cs_linux` sourcetype=\"sudousers\""] | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present") | table label, data

(`cs_linux_unix_version`) OR (`cs_linux_unix_uptime`) OR (`cs_linux_hardware`) host=$tkn_host|s$ | fields host, machine_architecture_name, os_release, os_name, os_version, SystemUpTime, , RealMemoryMB, SwapMemoryMB, cpu_cores, cpu_freq, cpu_freq_unit, cpu_type | eval cpu_freq=cpu_freq+" "+cpu_freq_unit | fields - cpu_freq_unit | stats latest(*) as * by host | eval SystemUpTime=toString(SystemUpTime,"duration") | table host, machine_architecture_name, os_release, os_name, os_version, RealMemoryMB, SwapMemoryMB, cpu_cores, cpu_freq, cpu_type, SystemUpTime
`cs_linux_open_ports` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host, Proto, Port | table host, _time , Proto, Port
`cs_linux_interfaces` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host, Name | rename Name as Interface_Name | table host, _time ,Interface_Name, enabled, inetAddr, inet6Addr, mac
`cs_linux_df` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host, Filesystem, MountedOn | table host, _time, Filesystem, MountedOn, Type, Size, Used
`cs_linux_unix_listening_ports` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host, dest_port, transport | table host,_time, dest_port, transport, app, user, dest_ip, ip_version, fd
`cs_linux_unix_service` host=$tkn_host|s$ | dedup host, type, UNIT | table host, _time,type, UNIT, LOADED, ACTIVE, SUB, DESCRIPTION
